title: Beyond Walpurgis
summary:
During the mid-19th century in Prussia, Dr. Maria Faust, known as the 'Witch of Könihilsberg' who made a pact with the devil Mephistopheles, meets Martin, a curious young man who dreams of becoming a novelist, while on a journey to find 'a way to bring the dead back to life'. . 

Faust is once knocked down by the villain Valentin, who was hostile to him, but rises again with the help of Martin, who admires her, and his student Wagner.

After that, Faust finds the truth he has been looking for, but he also realizes his mistakes... In the end, Faust finally feels the joy of life by saving the dying.

Was she really a witch?

title: Masked Knight Will Never Deceive The Villainess
summary: Can the ex-otaku villainess resist the perilous temptation coming from her beloved character, who happens to be her own killer?!

title: After Becoming a Dumpling, the Villain Family All Wants to Kill Me!
Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Me, The Heavenly Destined Villain
summary:
Gu Changge, a traveller from another world, comes to realize that he is the villain in this world. However, with his noble background, unrivalled abilities, and a cheat system that penalizes the protagonist, he is ready to steal the protagonist’s thunder and win the female lead’s heart…

---

**Original Webtoon:**  
- [KuaiKan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12602/)

**Official Translations:**  
- **Japanese**: 
  - [Piccoma](https://piccoma.com/web/product/119582)   
- **Korean**: 
   - [Kakao](https://page.kakao.com/content/61188260)  

- **English Ongoing**:

  - [Mangatoon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/i-am-the-fated-villain?content_id=3446131)
  - [Alandal](https://alandal.com/series/comic-i-am-the-fated-villain)
  - [Renta](https://www.ebookrenta.com/renta/sc/frm/item/146190/)

---

  - [Voyceme](https://www.voyce.me/series/i-am-the-fated-villain)

title: Enough with the Flirting
summary:
Life in the Great Pulha Woodlands is the very definition of stillness and tranquility—and Aesir's had enough of it! That's right. Aesir isn't quite like the other high elves of the forest. For starters, he remembers living a past life as a human in another world... meaning he's got a taste for meat, adventure, and plenty of other decidedly un-elven things! He's also bored out of his skull after 120 years of the peace and quiet of their serene sylvan lifestyle. So with nothing more than his trusty bow, a bundle of life-giving fruit, and his close bond with the spirits of nature, Aesir leaves the monotony of the forest behind to seek a new life, one that's more his pace.
___
* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/enough-with-this-slow-life-i-was-reincarnated-as-a-high-elf-and-now-i-m-bored)

title: Back from the Abyss: I Am the Disaster
summary: The Immortal Emperor family was wiped out overnight, and the young master Li Chen was thrown into the most mysterious and dangerous abyss! Eight years later, he broke out of the abyss, the empress in his left hand, and the gods and demons in his right hand, and everything he went was

title: The Villainess is Busy Baking Bread!
I Helped the Imprisoned Male Lead and He Became an Obsessive Man
summary:
I possessed an errand child who brought meals to the male protagonist who was captured as a test subject at the lab. If the experiment was successful and the male protagonist gained power, the lab would be engulfed in flames. So I tried to run away before that, but I felt bad for the male protagonist who was suffering from the cruel experiment. So I secretly took care of various things while avoiding the researchers' eyes.

"Come to think of it, what's your name?"

"I don't have a name..."

"You make me one."

"Huh?"

I somehow became a little close to the male protagonist.

"Are you going to abandon me? Don't do that."

"Ah... but-"

"Anis, do you mind if I'm wrong?"

"Ugh... No. No, I don't."

"Then stay by my side."

However, the only one who can cure him who is suffering from the side effects of the experiment is the original female protagonist.

I tried to help him and leave secretly so that he could find his partner...

"You promised not to abandon me. But, was it all a lie?”

With the burning laboratory in the background, Emilien smiled with cold eyes.

“A good child should keep his promises.”

The temperature of the hand touching my cheek is cold. The red eyes close as if they are going to engulf me.

“Answer, aren’t you going to tell me?”

...What should I do?

I think I missed my chance to run away.

title: I’m Done Being Your Best Friend
ugly complex
summary:
Ajin, who's only interested in baking, is a loyal girl who thinks "the Friendship is the best!"
When the super handsome Junwoo approaches her, an ordinary girl with glasses and braces,
her daily life begins to go awry…
"Why are you so mean to me?"
"Because I like you."
A truly heart-fluttering school romance between the straightforward Junwoo and the innocent Ajin!

title: Should Not
summary:
Frim, a 5-year-old orphan living in the streets of the slums district, was a Japanese person in her past life. Her everyday life was filled with violence and injustice, and she had no one she could count on for help. What she had is "Magic That Can Produce Water" and "Modern Knowledge", that was it. Even hoping for a roof to sleep under was a luxury under such circumstances. But the world was lacking in ideas about improving working conditions, and by coming up with new ways to use Water Magic aside from producing drinking water, Frim gradually makes a name for herself!

(Source: Comic-Walker)

title: For My Lost Love
summary: Jogo has a crush on his classmate, Miyato. One day, they unexpectedly end up walking home together after school. When Miyato is about to be hit by a truck, Jogo throws himself in harm's way to save her. In the final moment before impact, Jogo wishes he could have told Miyato how he felt. But then he hears a mysterious voice saying, "You can do it over. This time, don’t have any regrets." When he wakes up, he finds himself unharmed, lying on the ground, with a different version of Miyato beside him — she looks the same, but her clothes and hairstyle are different...?

title: How to Make My Tyrant Husband Love Me
summary:
[from cotton candy scans]  
  
“You guys are married from now on."  
  
The person I’ve admired for so long suddenly becomes my husband?! Takatsuki Honoka, 22 years old. I’ve been crushing on someone since I was in high school. He’s my father’s subordinate, the cool and handsome, yet super kind Nagakura Kousuke-san. One day, Kousuke-san suddenly becomes my husband!  
  
Official English translation on Comico's [Pocket Comics app](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics) (color edition)

title: I Underestimated My Oshi’s Attachment
summary:
Estefania worked herself to the bone for her family’s sake, while they took her for granted. One day, Estefania realized that, reincarnated in the world of her favorite novel, she was a supporting character who didn’t have much time left to live. She closed the book on her days of living in her family’s shadow, and set out to meet her oshi, the Grand Mage Synil Crown. However, as Synil is cold-hearted and ruthless, she had thought to be satisfied with just seeing him once, but before she knew it, she became the target of his attachment―!?
“S- Synil-sama, isn’t this a bit too close…?”
“In what way?”

Note: An “oshi” is a favorite member in an idol group or a favorite character from a story, movie, game, etc.

title: Black Chain
summary: The Emperor’s consort committed suicide. Hassolan, who devoted 14 years to Emperor Akelans, hung herself but woke up 14 years in the past. No matter what, she keeps returning to that day. The once cold Emperor now fiercely refuses to let her go, saying, “You are my mate. If you don’t want it, I won’t be Emperor.”

title: Dear, Not Cunning Witch
summary:
Talent doesn't always run in the family.
In an age ruled by science, there remain almighty witches with mythical powers. However, Diana ended up lacking any of her mother's witchly talent. In fact, ever since she began training at the age of 7, her only goal was to reunite with her sister. But life never turns out how we want, does it?

title: I Became The Duke’s Male Servant
summary:
The handsome Duke Voreoti is the most terrifying man in the empire, with the coldest of demeanors and a gaze that can kill. But one day, he suddenly says that he wants to… adopt a child?! And that child is me?! After finding me at a shady orphanage, he whisked me away to his snowy palace without a second thought. Now I’m learning all the ways of the feared Voreoti family from his knights. However, things get dicey when the Duke becomes suspicious of my origins. With these fangs and jet black hair, perhaps we are more than just kindred spirits…

---
"I'm going to adopt a child."

Duke Phileo Boleoti's impulsive decision shocked everyone in the mansion. Not only did he make her his daughter, but he also gave her the name of a 'beast' that only direct members of the bloodline could receive.

"Even as you breathe right now, I'm earning money."
"It's confidence, not arrogance."
"My face really does have its advantages."
The most arrogant father in the whole world, and-

"I love muscles the most. Let's get muscular."
"Show me your thigh muscles! Your butt would be even better!"
"You're nothing but a flower if you have a calm personality…" his corrupted(?) daughter. 

And… "I will give his excellency the information he wants most."

"Information I want most, you say…"

"You won’t regret it."

…A stepmother(?) with a strange secret as well.

title: I Regressed to Level Up Instead of Being a Simp
summary: After failing the college entrance examination and being cheated on, Han Li, who achieved nothing after graduation, made a wish to heaven: "I wish... to go back in time..." Thus the Consumer System appeared and Han Li regressed to the age of eighteen! Not enough skills? Upgrade them with points! Looks too ordinary? Fix that mug with some points! The rich classmate who always looked for trouble taught him a lesson, and captured the hearts of the goddesses... With this regression, let's witness how Han Li counterattacks and rises to the heavens!

title: What Does That Evil Dragon Live For?
summary:
Elaine becomes a human sacrifice to the evil dragon Rabess, who is here to destroy the empire. But it seems that Rabess already knows her. And he offers to grant her three wishes... 
Elaine feels she should at least save the world, so she asks him not to destroy it.  Then she ends up returning 10 years in the past, to when she was 16 years old. 
However, Rabess seems to have a different plan in mind...

title: I Became a Dead Character in a Prison for Wastes
summary:
I reincarnated into a novel… but, hey… What am I supposed to do if I reincarnate in 10 years before the novel begins?

The location: prison. The problem is that even a jungle is better than this place!

After ten years finally passed, I became the top dog in this prison. 

*
“Hey Mint. Cut it out. Don’t go overboard.”

“I have no idea what you’re talking about.”

I became a good-for-nothing leader, but I’m fine with that. That’s a privilege a pro gets. 

“I’ll make you dead on paper, so do me one last favour.”
“I have no idea what you’re on about.”

A golden opportunity was bestowed upon me. 

“If you help me, I’ll release you from prison.”
“What do you want me to do, Master?”
“...”

The chief of the prison asked me, the psycho of the prison, for a favor.

“Make the new guy coming into the leader of this prison.”

It may be called a prison, but in reality, it’s a lawless place. If I can make one man into the leader, I can finally be released.

“But to do that, you need to enter a male prison.”
“...Huh? How can I attach something that’s not there and get in?”

But oh god? The new guy is the male lead of the original novel.

title: Odalisque
summary:
The Asmanskaya Empire is ruled by the one and only Emperor (Sultan) Suleiman.
Within his harem, female slaves live burdened with complex emotions.
There is Hürrem, who won the Emperor’s favor through fierce competition.
Some long for the honor of sharing his bed—others dread it.
Some silently endure the shame of humiliation.

And Mahasti… drowns in a forbidden love with a eunuch.

Author [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Raku_ichikawa)

title: I Became the Rabbit Heroine’s Stepmother
summary: Gloria wakes to find that she has become the infamous evil stepmother of a cute little werebunny?! She has mysteriously entered a fantastical world of knights and werebeasts, but not as its main character. Now, she must prove that she is not the terrible person everyone thinks she is. It won’t be easy, but she has help. The World Tree’s butterfly guardians will aid her in winning the trust of her new husband and stepdaughter.

title: To My Beloved Foe
summary:
"This makes it the 562nd time I’ve killed this bastard."

Centuries ago, a monster by the name of Shinyoung cursed Dongyi with immortality. For years, he’s done nothing but wait for the perfect chance to get revenge, but killing an immortal is nearly impossible. Trapped in a twisted, endless cycle, he’s long since given up and settled into a strange form of cohabitation with his greatest enemy. But one day, when Shinyoung pushes him too far, Dongyi actually manages to kill him. Shinyoung, who always comes back laughing, doesn’t return this time.

An uneasy feeling creeps in, and Dongyi sets out to find him, only to discover that Shinyoung, for some reason, has lost all memories of him. "If you forget about me… then what happens to my revenge?!"

title: Bloody Marriage
summary:
Scarlett was a happy girl. With beautiful looks, a wealthy family, and even a kind fiancé, Scarlett was expected to be the most beautiful bride in the world. But on the morning of her wedding day, the pure-white bride was killed by someone. When she opened her eyes again, everything was different.   
  
"I've told you many times before. It's because I'm Scarlett Antwerp!"   
  
"I'm sorry, but the Esteemed Daughter of the Count, Lady Entwerp, is already dead."   
  
Waking up in a strange place, Scarlett could not understand what had happened to her. Why couldn't anyone recognize her? Why was her fiancé standing next to another woman? Why was she Vivian instead of Scarlett, the Esteemed Daughter of the Count? Why was the one next to her not her fiancé Edward, but Alexis, the police chief? Scarlett swore that she'd get her fiancé back and get revenge on the one who killed her.

title: World’s Greatest Senior Disciple
summary:
A senior disciple from a countryside martial academy returns as the world’s best! Dragged into a brutal political war, senior disciple ‘Hyeok Musang’ didn’t return after the bloody war ended. No one knew whether he was still alive for 5 years.

Upon barely returning to his hometown, he found his Dragon Tiger Martial Academy being persecuted and destroyed by a third-rate gang.

He thought he could live peacefully with his fellow members after winning the war but seeing the miserable state of his master and fellow disciples, he was filled with anger and guilt.

With the return of the senior disciple, everyone thought things would get better but only for a moment. Things were still happening in his hometown of Yangzhou County. Was the war really over? The head disciple raises his sword against the dangers threatening his Dragon Tiger Martial Academy.

title: Slow Melting
summary: My boyfriend is getting married. To my own sister, no less. I could handle the breakup. Betrayal was nothing new. But accepting the fact that once again my sister stole what was mine proved to be unbearable. In the midst of this heart-wrenching time, I encountered Yunhwan…

title: Don’t Cling To The Dead Villain
summary:
In a world that resembles an otome game, the villainess is determined to rewrite her fate!

Iris Gray, the daughter of a duke in the Kingdom of Calm, was living the life of a typical noble lady… until one day, she suddenly regained memories of her past life.
There, she realized she had once played a famous romance game — and now, she had been reincarnated as the villainess, destined to be executed for harassing the heroine known as “the Savior.”

With death looming as her scripted ending, Iris resolves to avoid her tragic fate at all costs.
Her first step?
Breaking off her engagement to Prince Elliot, the key figure in her downfall.
But there’s a catch — Elliot is so in love with her that he outright refuses to let her go.

Amid this inner and outer turmoil, a hidden power awakens within Iris — a unique magical gift called “Perception,” which grants her complete control over all forms of magic!

With this newfound ability, Iris realizes she may finally hold the key to reshaping her destiny… and preventing the execution scene that awaits her in the game’s original plot.

Can a so-called villainess truly survive and write herself a new ending?

A tale of romance, fantasy, and a brave rebellion against fate — the journey to flip destiny begins now!

title: Necromancer’s Evolutionary Traits
summary:
After clearing the game Peccata for the twelfth time, Kim Jinhwan finds himself inside its world as Adrias Cromwell, a weak and cowardly character who always ends up dead!

With six months left until he gets killed along with his master for practicing forbidden magic, Adrias starts training and gathering corpses to better his necromancy, determined to survive. 

But will this long-time gamer's necromancy skills and pre-existing knowledge be enough to change the sequence of events?

title: Lady of Iron Wall
summary:
Alpheus, the Marquis of Lothian and master of Silverglen Castle, is considered the perfect man with a brilliant mind and a handsome face. However, rumour has it that he suffers from a mysterious disease and always wears gloves.

His finance secretary Edith has been working for the marquis for years when he suddenly asks her to act as his fake fiancée. He seems to need an excuse to refuse the many marriage proposals offered to him, but what exactly is his plan that he strangely acts incredibly sincere in this contract relationship? The longer she pretends to be his fiancée, the more confused Edith becomes...

A cold-blooded noble and a lady with a defence as strong as an iron wall - the beginning of a workplace romance that starts with a contract!

title: I Quit the Hero’s Party
summary:
Zero was mankind’s first real superhero. Under his watch, countless other superheros appeared and followed in his footsteps. However, after 5 years of war, Zero disappeared without a trace.


---

**Note:** this is not your usual Chinese manhua, please read them from right to left (similar to Japanese format).

**Links:**
- [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1002/)

title: Starting As The God Of Wealth, Taming Billions Of Divine Pets!
summary:
The apocalypse game swept across the globe and merged with the real world, causing the collapse of order. In his previous life, Ye Xiao devoted everything to elevating his fiancée, Liu Ruyan, to the pinnacle of power, only to have his heart literally ripped out by her on the day of their engagement and transplanted into her male best friend. Reborn into a new life, Ye Xiao resolves to ascend the throne alone. Before the game closes its recharge portal, he spends billions of his fortune to switch to a god-level profession.

---

**Original Webtoon**: 
- [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/24688)

title: Deeply In Love
summary:
Because of a heartbreak in her past, Kirino decided to live more for her idol than for actual boys, but one day, transfer student Kametani-kun comes, who has a somewhat similar vibe to her idol! When Kametani-kun glares at the girls saying, “Don’t even think about talking to me!” on the very first day of transferring to the school, Kirino gets intrigued by him and learns his secret and…?!

(Source: K Manga)

title: Choose Me, Flora
summary:
"At the same day and hour, three children who should not be born will be born. Among them, one child holds everyone’s fate; depending on that child’s choice, one family will be annihilated and the child will die in the child’s own form. I, Theodoric, stake everything and curse this."

Like a curse, at that same day and hour, Mikael, Ezra, and Flora are born.

The three, as if by predetermined fate, eventually come face to face, and Flora must choose between the two...

title: The Sister Who Once Hated Me Now Loves Me
Marriage Blues
summary: On her wedding day, Hana Gu realizes her relationship lacks love and flees the ceremony. During her escapade, she runs into her ex-boyfriend, Gawi Nam who helps her by using his mysterious ability to time travel into the past. Determined to erase her unwanted marriage, she uses this ability to try and change her fate, but the future proves less malleable than expected. Amid repeated failures, she finds solace in Gawi, who is also trapped in the past, facing similar struggles. As they fight fate together, old feelings from their first love resurface, making Hana question -- does she truly want to change her fate?

title: Loving Summer Sky
summary: Baek Gihu, who loves the sky more than people, takes pictures of the sky with his camera. One summer day, a girl named "Haneul"—her name means "Sky"—transfers to his class and sits in the seat next to him.

title: Emotional Transference
summary: Su-a, a college freshman in Creative Writing, struggles to understand and express her emotions, leaving her isolated from those around her. When she meets Taeyang, a second-year Sports Coaching student who can sense emotions through touch, their unexpected connection sparks a journey of discovery. Paired for a class assignment that involves a "date," their bond deepens. This is a story about a man who feels too much and a woman who feels too little, and their journey toward emotional growth.

title: The regressor only protects me
summary:
“Let the survival game begin!”

Designated as a disruptive species in the universe’s ecology, humanity must now participate in the ‘league’ under the watchful eye of the universal administrators. 

Jin Jae-hui, sent back in time during the final stage of the game, arrives at one conclusion - only Kang Sion has the power to lead humanity to victory.

title: The Merman Trapped in My Lake
summary: “Selvaine, why haven’t you come to see me?” A person, no, a mermaid, calling out to my great-grandfather’s granddaughter who had resembled me. My ancestor, who had treasured the mermaid so, locked him in her lake. What would he have been thinking, waiting for someone who had been dead for over a hundred years. Enduring terrible agony, every day, day after day. Maybe, “I missed you.” … That’s clearly revenge.

title: The Rebellious Villainess Doesn’t Want To Be Swayed By The Obsessive Prince!
summary:
How many more times do I have to be a "villainess" before I can escape this life?"I" have lived as a villainess in many different Otome games. In all of them, the villainess's fiancée is captured by the heroine, the villainess is punished, and so on. No matter how hard I tried, that future would never change. "Villainess?　A broken marriage?　I'm sick of all of them. !!!!At the end of my last episode, I shouted out my complaints to the heavens. I was then reincarnated and began my life as "Catherine the Villainess's daughter" and it was somehow different from before!　My fiancée, who was supposed to abandon me, says that he loves me ........Catherine!?

This is a romantic comedy fantasy about the reincarnated villainess's daughter and an obsessed prince who can't stop loving her.

title: My Childhood Friends Are trying to Kill Me
summary: I not only reincarnated into someone who died in an absurd fashion, but I also took the crown prince's place and went to the secret neutral territory, where male members of the five imperial families gathered. As a result… my childhood friends know me as a boy.    “Goodbye, guys." I cried in front of my friends who I would never meet again. That was because officially, I (the prince) was going to die soon!    It was fun spending time with them, but I will never see them again. I hope everyone lives happily!    ***    After many years, my childhood friends turned heroes who defeated the wild dragon visited me.    "…Was it you? The one who killed my friend?"    “After killing the previous crown prince, the murderer is said to be living comfortably as a princess, right?”    “I will torture you, so much so you'll wish for death."     "Answer me. Why did you kill him?”    Of course, they didn't recognize me at all. No, that's not the problem… the problem is that my childhood friends are trying to kill me. Wait a second, guys!

title: The Queen of Retainers is obsessed over at night
If a Second Marriage Can Save You
The Young Lady’s Secretary
summary: Marquis' daughter, Charlotte, was blessed with a [Gift] known as [Monster Eater], which allows her to deliciously consume monsters. However, she was exiled from her real family because "eating monsters is vulgar!" Thus, she embarks on a journey of adventure. And so, she reaches the pinnacle as the strongest existence...!!

title: The Villainous Family Is Against Independence
summary:
Elodie, the illegitimate daughter of a family of murderous villains with no sense of family, suddenly discovers her past life!

She realizes that she has been reincarnated in a novel she read in a previous life. When the real heroine shows up three years later, she realizes she's been abandoned by her villainous family and is destined to be killed. She was doing okay until her sister showed up, and she thought, "Let's be independent from this family!"

"Independence, what kind of bullshit is that?"

"Who dared to put such ideas into your head?"

"Sister, you don't think you're going to run away by any chance, do you?"

My family is against independence? I want to live, let me be independent!
